data.name: Machop_0
data.value: Oh yeah, Did I mention about Tactics?

data.name: Machop_1
data.value: You might need to pay attention to your teammates once the size of your active team reached a certain point.

data.name: Machop_2
data.value: If you notice that things aren't going as planned, check the Tactics menu frequently if Team Mode isn't active.

data.name: Machop_3
data.value: Otherwise, plan ahead using your best strategy and imagine it as a Tactics RPG.

data.name: Machop_4
data.value: Did you get all that?

data.name: Machop_5
data.value: I see... Let me repeat that.

data.name: Machop_6
data.value: Keep that in mind because I have a present for you, and thanks for listening.

data.name: Machop_7
data.value: Have fun in your journey.

data.name: Bayleef_0
data.value: Oh, You've come. Listen, I got a mission for you.

data.name: Bayleef_1
data.value: I heard that a berry could help my sister recover from her illness..

data.name: Bayleef_2
data.value: Kind gentleman, could you please locate that Lum Berry for my ill sister?

data.name: Natu_0
data.value: If you're heading out to dungeon, Make sure to check the Storage and Assembly often.

data.name: Natu_1
data.value: Just in case you don't lose items and money when you are wiped...

data.name: Corsola_0
data.value: Some enigmatic lightning destroyed the bridge south of the park...

data.name: Mankey_0
data.value: I've expected you, {0}, I got a map to spare for you.

data.name: Mankey_1
data.value: The entrance to the dungeon is to the west of the D'Avigny and Amusement Park.

data.name: Mankey_2
data.value: Don't die for us because there must be something lurking within.

data.name: Message_1
data.value: New Dungeons are unlocked.[pause=300]

data.name: Cradily_0
data.value: Could you help me locate four sticks? They're said to be scattered throughout the dungeons.

data.name: Cradily_1
data.value: I will perform a ritual to summon a helpful Pokemon and promise to never harm anyone.

data.name: Chinchou_0
data.value: Want to know how to bring only the necessary items? I have one suggestion.

data.name: Chinchou_1
data.value: Cherry Congjin and New Forest are loaded up with the mons that can be enlisted with Green Apricorn.

data.name: Chinchou_2
data.value: Don't let the Apricorns go to waste, please!

data.name: Bayleef_3
data.value: Wait? You really get that Lum Berry for me? Gimme that!

data.name: Bayleef_4
data.value: She'll be here later once I give her that berry, thank you very much.

data.name: Cradily_2
data.value: Sticks, there you are! Come to me now, and allow me to perform the ritual!

data.name: Cradily_3
data.value: Kind explorers, I am grateful! I'll be going off to start a ritual, if you'll excuse me.

data.name: Corsola_1
data.value: Strange... I can't seems to move...

data.name: Powwene_0
data.value: The hole is encircling your back!

data.name: Corsola_2
data.value: Eh-xcuse me?

data.name: Powwene_1
data.value: Move!

data.name: Corsola_3
data.value: Wah! That hurt!

data.name: Powwene_2
data.value: I knew that! She was accurate. Down here, there is an entrance. Let's enter.

data.name: Corsola_4
data.value: You could have moved me somewhere by gently picking me up...

data.name: Corsola_5
data.value: ....... But Thanks...

data.name: Wooper_0
data.value: What, you ask? How would you feel if you were held captive by a Drifloon?

data.name: Igglybuff_0
data.value: Ahahahaha! That was scary!! Hahahaha!

data.name: Pichu_0
data.value: There's a secret steps under Corsola. Drive her away to uncover the area.

data.name: Pichu_1
data.value: As I was saying...

data.name: Pichu_2
data.value: Maybe I shouldn't trust Drifloon at all.

data.name: Chinchou_3
data.value: Just... how heavy Corsola was?

data.name: Mamel_0
data.value: Um, You're [color=#009CFF]{0}[color], right?

data.name: Mamel_1
data.value: I was just sent to this world for this reason but...

data.name: Mamel_2
data.value: How exactly did I get here?

data.name: Togetic_Wipeout_0
data.value: Oh, the indignity!

data.name: Togetic_Wipeout_1
data.value: You were vanquished in the dungeon. Be grateful that when you were rescued by the explorers.

data.name: Togetic_Wipeout_2
data.value: I suppose you should be more careful out there next time.

data.name: Togetic_0
data.value: How are you? Would you like to establish a secure point here??

data.name: Togetic_1
data.value: Please be patient while I secure this area for you.[pause=300]

data.name: Togetic_2
data.value: Done! You will be safe here the next time you die. I wish you luck out there.

data.name: Powwene_3
data.value: Hold on, we are unable to enter yet. We must locate the shrine someplace...

data.name: Vulpix_0
data.value: I'm just hawking like this in light of the fact that nobody's come to my shop for some time.

data.name: Smoochum_0
data.value: Think I almost drowned of my mind...! I wouldn't last longer without you.

data.name: Wooper_1
data.value: [color=#00FFFF]Smoochum[color] is safe now, Thank goodness.

data.name: Pichu_3
data.value: Thank you for the help! We're now reunited!

data.name: Smoochum_1
data.value: "Where's [color=#00FFFF]Powwene[color]?" you might ask. She had decided to investigate outside.

data.name: Smoochum_2
data.value: She promised to return safely to play with me, so I hope she does.

data.name: Wooper_2
data.value: [color=#00FFFF]Igglybuff[color] is going on a journey? I wish him a safe trip.

data.name: Pichu_4
data.value: I wish I could tell him to "Walk Tall"... I really missed him.

data.name: Smoochum_3
data.value: [color=#00FFFF]Igglybuff[color]... heading out? I can't believe it...

data.name: Zigzagoon_0
data.value: Agh! Detective, Quickly!

data.name: Zigzagoon_1
data.value: The [color=#00FFFF]Slowking[color]'s Rock is being taken by someone who intends to become an abusive ruler.

data.name: Zigzagoon_2
data.value: There is a reward for anyone who returns the crown, and bring [color=#00FFFF]Slowking[color] that charlatan.

data.name: Misdreavus_0
data.value: What? I'm on my way!

data.name: Misdreavus_1
data.value: Sorry! Can't talk any further, I got a job to do!

data.name: Shuppet_0
data.value: Stay safe!

data.name: Shuppet_1
data.value: So... There's a favor I want to ask you...

data.name: Shuppet_2
data.value: Oh man... Just as I got into the most important part.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: What a bummer, You have nothing to sell.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Before you make a purchase, please clear some space, okay?

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Hold on, Let me see what I got...! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: I am grateful for your business!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: Tomorrow, we'll replenish! Sorry!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that comes to {0}. Is that OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: Come on, you can't fool me without my money.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: That {1}? That will be {0}.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: See you next time!

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: So, do you have any connection to my company?

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Oh... Uhh... What do you got? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Thanks!

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay {0} for everything, yes?

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can pay {0} for that {1}, yes?

data.name: Buneary_0
data.value: Many friends of mine called me a Coward...

data.name: Buneary_1
data.value: I'm no cower, I'll show them how coward I actually am!

data.name: Buneary_2
data.value: Baby Togepi, Baby Togepi, Baby Togepi, Baby Togepi...

data.name: Message_2
data.value: She's suffering from the nightmare...

data.name: Nuzleaf_0
data.value: Psst, There's a secret I'd want to talk to you.

data.name: Nuzleaf_1
data.value: Some tough opponents on their arena can be recruitable too.

data.name: Nuzleaf_2
data.value: Or "Mid-Bosses" as they call it...

data.name: Nuzleaf_3
data.value: That's right, I'm not kidding! Just throw the apricorns at them...

data.name: Nuzleaf_4
data.value: and you'll have them carries you without problem! Oh yeah!

data.name: Nuzleaf_5
data.value: Hope this will help!

data.name: Nuzleaf_6
data.value: You can recruit "Mid-Bosses" on some dungeons. This will do the trick!

data.name: Nuzleaf_7
data.value: Oh, by the way, New Forest in the Middle, have two strong mons. I don't know much but...

data.name: Nuzleaf_8
data.value: All I know is watch out for [color=#A8B820]Bug[color] and [color=#C03028]Fighting[color] attacks! So...

data.name: Nuzleaf_9
data.value: You better get Psychic, Fairy and Flying Friends, Here's a key to the dungeon called [color=#00FFFF]Pink and Blue[color] for that case.

data.name: Mankey_3
data.value: Oh, You say you've encountered the White Creature known as Gapori? and it's feeling down?

data.name: Mankey_4
data.value: Here, I believe this cuisine will brighten it up.

data.name: Message_3
data.value: Turnip Obtained![pause=120]

data.name: Mankey_5
data.value: Let me guess, you must be [color=#00FFFF]Gapori[color]!

data.name: Gapori_0
data.value: Without a doubt, do you have any business with me?

data.name: Mankey_6
data.value: So, I went out to explore somewhere and discovered this new map location hiding there.

data.name: Mankey_7
data.value: I'm sure you'll find this useful!

data.name: Gapori_1
data.value: Thank you really much! By the way, do you know how to get me out of the world? Being here feels so out of place...

data.name: Mankey_8
data.value: Not that I know of, Sorry.

data.name: Gapori_2
data.value: Well, slap my thought...

data.name: Mankey_9
data.value: Whoa... This is just terrible.

data.name: Mankey_10
data.value: Compared to my expection about how you look, [color=#00FFFF]Gapori[color]. I was expecting Frosmoth, Chien-Pao and Alcremie. You just look bland, ROFL!

data.name: Gapori_3
data.value: Why you lit-TLE!!

data.name: Mankey_11
data.value: Wimp! Your attacks won't work against me!

data.name: Gapori_4
data.value: You're lucky {0} holding me back on harming you!

data.name: Gapori_5
data.value: Let's just go and ignore that brat!

data.name: Chinchou_4
data.value: I think I just remembered something...

data.name: Chinchou_5
data.value: I wish to experience love through a heart-shaped pokemon.

data.name: Chinchou_6
data.value: Don't get me wrong, I'd lost faith in romance, but... Could you assist me by bringing me one?

data.name: Igglybuff_1
data.value: Say, it's about time I demonstrated my strength! My pals suggested I was up for the fight!

data.name: Igglybuff_2
data.value: I will travel to [color=#00FFFF]Cobalt Cells[color], and I'll be leaving everything to myself! Don't be concerned; I'll be alright!

data.name: Chinchou_7
data.value: Hey, I believe this is the one I'm searching for, Yo!

data.name: Player_Luvdisc_0
data.value: Hm, What do you need me for?

data.name: Chinchou_8
data.value: Is it true that your species is filled with loves?

data.name: Player_Luvdisc_1
data.value: With me at your side, you should begin to sense some eternal love and, without a doubt, you will find a new love!

data.name: Chinchou_9
data.value: Oh, thank you! I'll do my best, and I'll find a new love soon!

data.name: Corsola_6
data.value: I'm going to kill [color=#00FFFF]Chinchou[color]; he's going to die in retaliation for damaging the bridge.

data.name: Nuzleaf_10
data.value: Shouldn't [color=#00FFFF]Chinchou[color] turn himself in instead of seeking true love for breaking the bridge?

data.name: Mamel_3
data.value: [color=#00FFFF]Chinchou[color]'s life is rigged, and I can't stand him!

data.name: Gapori_6
data.value: Hey... Something seems strange about the locals...

data.name: Gapori_7
data.value: OH MY GOD! They did not!

data.name: Gapori_8
data.value: That was... harrowing.

data.name: Togetic_3
data.value: Hey {0}, over there!

data.name: Gapori_9
data.value: Is something matter?

data.name: Togetic_4
data.value: I have a feeling the root of the corruption is from above...

data.name: Togetic_5
data.value: The individuals you battled were driven by corruption, and I regret the pain you had to deal with and murder them.

data.name: Gapori_10
data.value: Can't you revive them?

data.name: Togetic_6
data.value: It goes beyond my purpose... But I have a spare set of stones!

data.name: Togetic_7
data.value: Take this for the purpose of immunological deterioration in addition to having objects respond to this!

data.name: Message_4
data.value: You got the Immune Stone![pause=220]

data.name: Gapori_11
data.value: Come on, Let's head to Amusement Park, Something must have happens to them too!
